content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
No structures have been created on the map yet.

### ERROR TIPS
* Errors when inserting items into a furnace: 
  - Ensure that the item to be inserted is available in the inventory.
  - Check that the furnace is not full and can accept more items.
* Errors when using an inserter: 
  - Ensure that the inserter has fuel (coal) to operate.
  - Check that the inserter is not waiting for source items.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent yet.
Important variables that have been assigned:
* Inventory: {'transport-belt': 3, 'burner-mining-drill': 1, 'stone-furnace': 1, 'iron-ore': 1058, 'iron-plate': 168} (type: dictionary)
